context: A multi-stage security incident involving potential human-operated malicious activity was observed, which might lead to ransomware or other payloads installed on target devices. As part of this incident, the file `rubeus.exe` was used to dump Kerberos tickets on host `vnevado-win10b` by account `kyleg` with IP address `141.216.110.153`.
question: In the alert indicating possible use of the Rubeus kerberoasting tool, which SID was associated with the suspicious account activity?
solution_steps: Possible human-operated malicious activity was observed involving the file `adminticket.txt`.
The Rubeus kerberoasting tool might have been used on an endpoint involving an account with SID `S-5-7-21-1843151660-3234030288-105586167-1422`.
